Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.31.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35255 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.31.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package telegraf is earlier than 1.31.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-35255
